title: What is Machine learning?
output: The autonomous acquisition of knowledge through the use of computer programs

options.a: The autonomous acquisition of knowledge through the use of manual programs
options.b: The selective acquisition of knowledge through the use of manual programs
options.c: The autonomous acquisition of knowledge through the use of computer programs
options.d: The selective acquisition of knowledge through the use of computer programs
